dao.name: QRYDEPOSITNOSSELECT
dao.statement: select d.deposit_nos , d.alt_nam , d.BANLANCE_AMT , d.UNIINV_STA , d.ID_COD , d.HAND_NOS , rf.type1_nam from deposit_mn d,dps_type1_rf rf where d.athena_id = rf.athena_id and d.athena_id = :athena_id and trim(d.hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and group_cod in (select group_cod from rspt_rf r where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and sys_cod = 'HC' and rownum = 1)
